Class.name: WiFIS.V153.Test.Prod
Class.Description: Producción de ejemplo para probar componentes WiFIS

XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="WiFIS.V153.Test.Prod" TestingEnabled="true" LogGeneralTraceEvents="true"> <Description></Description> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="ShutdownTimeout">5</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="UpdateTimeout">5</Setting> <Item Name="Leer HL7 ER7 Fichero" Category="Salida" ClassName="EnsLib.HL7.Service.FileService" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="MessageSchemaCategory">WIFIS</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigNames">WiFIS_Crear_Msg</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FilePath">C:\Test\WIFIS\inHL7</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="ArchivePath">C:\Test\WIFIS\archivedHL7</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FileSpec">*.hl7</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ArchiveIO">1</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Charset">UTF-8</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="IgnoreInboundAck">0</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS_Crear_Msg" Category="Salida" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.Test.BP.CrearMsg" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS_Router_V153" Category="Salida" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BP.Router" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigName">WiFIS_Validacio_BO_V153</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS_eConsultes_BO_V153" Category="Salida" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BO.WIFISHL7Port" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceClientClass">WiFIS.V153.WSC.eConsultes.eConsultesSoap</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceURL">http://localhost:57774/wifisws/WiFIS.V153.BS.eConsultes.eConsultesSoap.cls</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ArchiveIO">1</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="SOAPCredentials"></Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS.V153.BS.eConsultes.eConsultesSoap" Category="Entrada" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BS.eConsultes.eConsultesSoap" PoolSize="0" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigName">WiFIS_Procesar_Msg</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ArchiveIO">1</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS_Procesar_Msg" Category="Entrada" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.Test.BP.ProcesarMsg" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="Validate">1</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ValidationReportTarget">Escribir Informe Validación Fichero</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="Escribir HL7 XML Fichero" Category="Entrada" ClassName="ITB.HL7.BO.FileXMLOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FilePath">C:\Test\WIFIS\outHL7</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ArchiveIO">1</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="MessageSchemaCategory">WIFIS</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="Charset">UTF-8</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="Escribir HL7 ER7 Fichero" Category="Entrada" ClassName="EnsLib.HL7.Operation.FileOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FilePath">C:\Test\WIFIS\outHL7</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="Filename">%f_%Q.hl7</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ArchiveIO">1</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS.V153.BS.Cites.CitesSoap" Category="Entrada" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BS.Cites.CitesSoap" PoolSize="0" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigName">WiFIS_Procesar_Msg</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS.V153.BS.ConsultaDades.ConsultaDadesSoap" Category="Entrada" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BS.ConsultaDades.ConsultaDadesSoap" PoolSize="0" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigName">WiFIS_Procesar_Msg</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS.V153.BS.Laboratori.LaboratoriSoap" Category="Entrada" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BS.Laboratori.LaboratoriSoap" PoolSize="0" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigName">WiFIS_Procesar_Msg</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS_Cites_BO_V153" Category="Salida" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BO.WIFISHL7Port" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceClientClass">WiFIS.V153.WSC.Cites.CitesSoap</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceURL">http://localhost:57774/wifisws/WiFIS.V153.BS.Cites.CitesSoap.cls</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS_ConsultaDades_BO_V153" Category="Salida" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BO.WIFISHL7Port" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceURL">http://localhost:57774/wifisws/WiFIS.V153.BS.ConsultaDades.ConsultaDadesSoap.cls</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceClientClass">WiFIS.V153.WSC.ConsultaDades.ConsultaDadesSoap</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS_Laboratori_BO_V153" Category="Salida" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BO.WIFISHL7Port" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceClientClass">WiFIS.V153.WSC.Laboratori.LaboratoriSoap</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceURL">http://localhost:57774/wifisws/WiFIS.V153.BS.Laboratori.LaboratoriSoap.cls</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS_Derivacions_BO_V153" Category="Salida" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BO.WIFISHL7Port" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceClientClass">WiFIS.V153.WSC.Derivacions.DerivacionsSoap</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceURL">http://localhost:57774/wifisws/WiFIS.V153.BS.Derivacions.DerivacionsSoap.cls</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS.V153.BS.Derivacions.DerivacionsSoap" Category="Entrada" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BS.Derivacions.DerivacionsSoap" PoolSize="0" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigName">WiFIS_Procesar_Msg</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="Ens.Alert" Category="" ClassName="EnsLib.EMail.AlertOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="false" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS.V153.BS.Validacio.ValidacioWIFISPort" Category="Entrada" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BS.Validacio.ValidacioWIFISPort" PoolSize="0" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="true" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="ArchiveIO">1</Setting> <Setting Target="Host" Name="TargetConfigName">WiFIS_Procesar_Msg</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="WiFIS_Validacio_BO_V153" Category="Salida" ClassName="WiFIS.V153.BO.ValidacioPort" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceClientClass">WiFIS.V153.WSC.Validacio.ValidacioWIFISPort</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="WebServiceURL">http://localhost:57774/wifisws/WiFIS.V153.BS.Validacio.ValidacioWIFISPort.cls</Setting> </Item> <Item Name="Escribir Informe Validación Fichero" Category="Entrada" ClassName="EnsLib.File.PassthroughOperation" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Host" Name="Filename">%f_%Q.txt</Setting> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="FilePath">C:\Test\WIFIS\val</Setting> </Item> </Production>

Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)
